author: Cassiodorus, Senator, approximately 487-approximately 580
title: Hystoria tripertita. Habes, candidissime lector, hystoriam tripertitam Cassiodori Senatoris viri Dei [ex Sozomeno, Socrate et Theodoreto ab Epiphanio Scholastico versam], de regimine Ecclesie primitive, que antea quamplurimis scatebat erroribus adamussim
